body.p: Tennessee-born, Mississippi farmer, soldier, and guerilla. Married to Rhoda P. Balch Street. Father of Jesse A. Street and M. A. Street. Served as a sergeant in the 2nd Mississippi Infantry from 1861 to 1862. Served as a Captain in the 2nd Mississippi State Cavalry (Co. A) from 1862 to 1863. Served as major in the 15th (Consolidated) Tennessee Cavalry (Streetâ€™s Battalion) in 1864. Killed in action on May 3, 1864.
